page.title: 18THE AMBULANCE SERVICE(2)
page.content: In each ambulance there are two stretchers which carry 8 sitting passengers or two lying down. The stretchers are on wheels and can be raised and lowered,and many other positions to give the passenger the most comfortable ride.There is also a scoop stretcher,which can be split in half,to enable a person with a back injury to be picked up without being moved.Ther is a carrying chair to carry people up and down the steps. The ambulance also carries oxgen, ethanox (a gas that kills pain),a breathing machine and an aspirator (to suck up blood or vomit). There are also various types of tools for fractures.Each ambulance man has his own first aid pack,consisting of bandages,plasters,stethascope, scissors,airways and safety pins.
